name: The Jimquisition - Dark Style
description:
Thank god for him.
And for high contrast themes.

user.name: CheatFreak47
user.about: I make userstyles that usually make sites easier to use or make them easier on the eyes.

additional_info:
-add new comments system
-do pagination, search bar, add credit tag
-change name to line up with my preferences
-initial post, did most of what I planned to do. Feedback appreciated, as always. Wasn't much work, Jim's Site is quite lightweight and simple to understand.
